short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Tab Extension for SUNY Owego Students

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome new-tab extension built for SUNY Oswego Students

Functions: 

- Easy access to Email, BlackBoard, myOswego, Dining Menu, and The Oswegonian
- Oswego events calendar integration for all Oswego student events
- Popup window with shortcut links via Oswego icon in top-right corner
- Shortcuts to commonly used social media sites
- Current Oswego weather and descriptions

Features: 

-Hover to reveal name of link
-Choose which social media sites are on your homepage (via icon in top left corner)
-Click on 'AccessOswego' to share with a friend
-Rotating background images
